Posts.Content: We agree with, 1 chemo down 5 to go and LET DOWN.  Our mortgage is the only loan we have and we've saved up for our extension and building repairs. This appears to be a mistake, the first thing going against you is your hard earned savings and pensions. Whats it all about, work hard and end up sinking or screw the state and stay afloat.
